directions: Pour pineapple into a greased 9x13-inch baking dish.
Sprinkle with brown sugar and cinnamon.
Sprinkle with cake mix and pecans.
Bake at 350 degrees F for 40 to 50 minutes or until filling is bubbly and topping is golden brown.
Serve warm with ice cream if desired.
ingredients: 1 (21 ounce) can LUCKY LEAF® Premium Blueberry Fruit Filling
1 (20 ounce) can unsweetened crushed pineapple, undrained
title: Blueberry-Pecan Crisp
